Insect Shield''Naruto Collectible Card Game'' |parent jutsu=Parasitic Destruction Insect Technique |jutsu classification=Hiden~Aburame Clan, Ninjutsu |jutsu class type=Defensive |jutsu range=Short |users=Shino Aburame, Shibi Aburame |boruto=No |debut anime=74 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto Mobile |jutsu media=Anime, Game }} By releasing a large number of [[kikaichū]], the user creates a massive wall out of them, which protects both himself and allies nearby. The wall is strong enough to protect against large falling objects''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 163 and [[Fire Release]] techniques.''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 236 == Trivia == * Though unnamed in the anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Mobile]]''. == References == [[fr:Technique Secrète - Mur d'Insectes]] [[pt-br:Escudo de Inseto]]
